name: 2019 International Symposium on Business and Social Sciences (2019 ISBASS)
content: International Symposium on Business and Social Sciences (ISBASS 2019) is an international platform for scholars, researchers and practitioners to discuss interdisciplinary research and practices in the fields of social sciences, business, education and more. 2019 ISBASS will take place from January 8 to 10, 2019 in Taipei, Taiwan. Prospective authors are invited to submit original research abstracts or full papers which were not, are not and have not been submitted/published/under consideration in other conferences and journals. â˜…Topic Business &Management Communication Economics Education Finance (Accounting, Banking) Humanities and Culture Studies Law Literature and Linguistics Politics Psychology Social Studies
